about_the_game:
Venture into the depths of Eldoria


Beneath the enchanting realm of Eldoria, a shadowy menace looms. One man is compelled to descend. Embark on this epic odyssey and discover the unyielding love of a father as he battles through the shadows to rescue his beloved daughter, Freya.

Orin is a timeless 2.5D fast-paced metroidvania that takes you on a journey through treacherous landscapes, diverse tribes, and the depths of a father's heart. Traverse perilous platforms, unravel ancient puzzles, and battle malevolent forces; forge alliances with curious creatures and uncover long-lost truths buried deep within.



Orin's content


  • Precise 2D Controls: Dodge, dash, and shoot through waves of adversaries with precise controls that reward skill.
  • Telekinesis: Control objects in your surrounding to make them work in your favor.
  • Relics: Personalize your journey with your favorites. Harness the ancient relics known as Pralin, each offering unique powers and abilities.
  • Powerful Abilities: Evolve your skills with powerful abilities. Gain spells, strength, speed, ammo, super boots, blazing dashes, cape shield, telekinesis.
  • Expansive Interconnected World: Explore the sprawling world of Eldoria, replete with forgotten ruins, overgrown wilderness, and decaying cities.
  • Mapping Tools: Enhance your journey with mapping tools. Acquire compasses, maps, and pins to master Eldoria's ever-changing landscapes.
  • Captivating Score: The haunting, intimate score by Mathew Mozzoni accompanies you on your journey, echoing the majesty and sorrow of a world brought to ruin.
  • Father's Journal: Record every twisted foe you encounter and build your legacy as a relentless hunter.
  • 120+ Enemies: Face ferocious beasts and vanquish ancient knights on your quest through the kingdom. Track down every last twisted foe and add them to your Hunter's Journal.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Challenge 15 epic bosses, from ferocious beasts to ancient knights. Prove your mettle as you face each formidable foe.
  • Speed running mode: When the game is finished 100%, you acquire the cape of doom, which enables you to use infinite dashes.

    A Hand-Crafted World of Enchantment


    In the mystical realm of Eldoria, the world is meticulously sculpted, breathing life into a captivating, moody universe. Its depths are teeming with the eerie and the unknown, where each denizen is meticulously brought to life through the artistry of traditional 3D animation.

    Every uncharted domain you traverse is a masterwork of beauty and peculiarity. Here, you'll encounter a tapestry of curious creatures and enchanting characters, each designed with care and animated by hand. Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing sights and unravel the enigmatic secrets concealed in the unexplored corners of this mesmerizing world.

    For the Discerning Adventurer


    If you relish classic gameplay, relatable yet haunting characters, epic adventures that test your mettle, and a world that exudes gothic splendor, then Orin beckons. Embark on this extraordinary journey now!



Orin's team

  • Theo Mellon - 3D design, UI design, world design, art direction
  • Yuriet Miranda Rodríguez - 3D design, UI design, world design
  • Mathew Mozzoni - composer, sound design
  • Daylen Mas - Marketing and research
  • David - game Design, development, production, original idea

short_description: Orin is a fast-paced metroidvania inspired by the story of a valiant warrior in the enchanting Eldoria. Explore mighty ruins, fight malevolent enemies, and forge unexpected alliances in this captivating world.
